roleset.name: faint, pass out
roleset.note: FAINT-V NOTES: Some of my female ringing friends could whup this guy's sorry ass. (from faint.01-v)
FAINTING-N NOTES: Corresponds with faint.01 (from fainting.01-n)

example.name: faint-v: sexist bigots in the belltower
example.text: One writer, signing his letter as ``Red-blooded, balanced male,'' remarked on the ``frequency of women fainting in peals,'' and suggested that they ``settle back into their traditional role of making tea at meetings.''

example.name: fainting-n: Basic
example.text: His chronic fainting was starting to affect his work in Nascar.

roleset.name: feeling weak, perhaps as precedes a loss of consciousness
roleset.note: FAINT-J NOTES: Added by Julia for AMR.

role.descr: body part or domain of weakness

example.name: faint-j
example.text: He was feeling faint from the fumes.

example.name: faint-j
example.text: If you're feeling faint of heart, you'd better hide out in the woods till he gets gone.

example.name: faint-j
example.text: There is a plethora of restaurants along the boardwalk, so if one is feeling faint of wallet dining within the hotel, I suggest taking a walk out the front door...

example.name: faint-j
example.text: The writing was faint from years in the sun.
